name: vespa-watch
description: Website for the monitoring of Vespa velutina

scripts.copy:leaflet: dir='vespawatch/static/vespawatch/libraries/leaflet' && mkdir -p $dir/images && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js $dir/leaflet.js && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css $dir/leaflet.css && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* $dir/images && cp node_modules/leaflet-geosearch/dist/bundle.min.js $dir/leaflet-geosearch.min.js && cp node_modules/leaflet-spin/leaflet.spin.min.js $dir/leaflet.spin.min.js && cp node_modules/spin.js/spin.min.js $dir/spin.min.js
scripts.copy:vue: dir='vespawatch/static/vespawatch/libraries/vue' && mkdir -p $dir && cp node_modules/vue/dist/vue.js $dir/vue.js && cp node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js $dir/vue.min.js && cp node_modules/vue-datetime/dist/vue-datetime.min.js $dir/vue-datetime.min.js && cp node_modules/vue-datetime/dist/vue-datetime.min.css $dir/vue-datetime.min.css && cp node_modules/luxon/build/global/luxon.min.js $dir/luxon.min.js && cp node_modules/vue2-dropzone/dist/vue2Dropzone.js $dir/vue2Dropzone.js && cp node_modules/vue2-dropzone/dist/vue2Dropzone.min.css $dir/vue2Dropzone.min.css
scripts.copy:libraries: npm run copy:bootstrap && npm run copy:axios && npm run copy:crossfilter && npm run copy:leaflet && npm run copy:moment && npm run copy:vue && npm run copy:wnumb
scripts.create:css: dir='vespawatch/static/vespawatch/css/' && mkdir -p $dir && node-sass static_src/scss --output-style nested --source-map true --output $dir
scripts.build:all: npm run wipe:static && npm run copy:libraries && npm run copy:custom-js && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:img && npm run create:css
